sentences.sContent: Listening to a purring cat through a stethoscope is also a great relaxation technique.
sentences.sContent_eng: Listening to a purring cat through a stethoscope is also a great relaxation technique.
sentences.sCn: 用听诊器听猫发出呼噜呼噜的声音，也是很好的放松技巧。

sentences.sContent: I leaned in the corner, stripped of my stethoscope and white coat of authority, as Chip stood examining Ruth.
sentences.sContent_eng: I leaned in the corner, stripped of my stethoscope and white coat of authority, as Chip stood examining Ruth.
sentences.sCn: 我站在角落里，摘掉我戴着的听诊器脱掉白大褂，静静地等待科迪给如斯进行体检。

sentences.sContent: Future capabilities, Mr Murphy hopes, might include a digital stethoscope to analyse breathing sounds and a haematoma scanner to look for a brain haemorrhage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Future capabilities, Mr Murphy hopes, might include a digital stethoscope to analyse breathing sounds and a haematoma scanner to look for a brain haemorrhage.
sentences.sCn: 墨菲先生希望，未来该装置的功能还包括：一个数字听诊器来分析呼吸声，一个血肿扫描仪以寻找脑部出血点。

trans.tranOther: an instrument that a doctor uses to listen to your heart or breathing
